title: Dracula: Sovereign of the Damned
text:
{{Marvel Database:Film Template | Image = Yami no Teio Kyuketsuki Dracula.jpg | Aliases = 闇の帝王 吸血鬼ドラキュラ
Dracula: The Vampire Emperor of Darkness
Dracula: Sovereign of the Damned | Directors = Minoru Okazaki; Akinori Nagaoka | Producers = Yoshiaki Koizumi; Yoshifumi Hatano; Takeyuki Suzuki | ComicWriters = [[Marv Wolfman]]; [[Gene Colan]]; [[Tom Palmer]] | StoryWriters = | ScreenplayWriters = Tadaaki Yamazaki | Musicians = Seiji Yokoyama | Cinematographers = | Editors = | ProductionCompanies = Toei Animation | Distributors = TV Asahi | Running Time = 94 minutes | Rating = | Language = Japanese | Budget = | Release Date = August 19, 1980 | IMDB ID = 0412665 | Marvel Movies = Dracula: Sovereign of the Damned | Previous Film = | Next Film = Frankenstein: Legend of Terror | Appearances = '''Featured Characters:''' * {{1st|[[Rachel van Helsing (Earth-800801)|Rachel van Helsing]]}} * {{1st|[[Francis Dracula (Earth-800801)|Frank Drake]]}} * {{1st|[[Quincy Harker (Earth-800801)|Quincy Harker]]}} (In some dubs, Quincy is renamed Hans) '''Supporting Characters:''' * {{1st|[[Abraham van Helsing (Earth-800801)|Abraham van Helsing]]}} '''Antagonists:''' * {{1st|[[Vlad Dracula (Earth-800801)|Vlad Dracula]]}} * {{1st|[[Lilith (Earth-800801)|Lilith]]}} (In some dubs, Lilith is renamed Layla) '''Other Characters:''' * {{1st|[[Domini Dracula (Earth-800801)|Domini Dracula]]}} (In some dubs, Domini is renamed Dolores) * {{1st|[[Janus Dracula (Earth-800801)|Janus Dracula]]}} * {{1st|[[Lucifer (Earth-800801)|Lucifer/Satan]]}} * {{1st|[[Anton Lupeski (Earth-800801)|Anton Lupeski]]}} * {{1st|[[Wheeler (Earth-800801)|Wheeler]]}} * {{1st|[[Mallisa (Earth-800801)|Mallisa]]}} * {{1st|[[Torgo (Earth-800801)|Torgo]]}} (In some dubs, Torgo is renamed Torgo Nia; in some places, his name was miswritten as Tomo) '''Locations:''' * {{1st|[[Earth-800801]]}} ** {{1st|[[Transylvania]]}} ** {{1st|[[Castle Dracula]]}} '''Items:''' *
'''Vehicles:''' *
| Plot = | Cast = * [[wikipedia:Kenji Utsumi|Kenji Utsumi]] as Vlad Dracula * [[wikipedia:Hiroko Suzuki|Hiroki Suzuki]] as Domini Dracula (In some dubs, Domini is renamed Dolores) * [[wikipedia:Kazuyuki Sogabe|Kazuyuki Sogabe]] as Janus Dracula * Yasuo Hisamatsu as Hans Harker (In some dubs, Quincy is renamed Hans) * [[wikipedia:Mami Koyama|Mami Koyama]] as Rachel van Helsing * Kei'ichi Noda as Drake * [[wikipedia:Hidekatsu Shibata|Hidekatsu Shibata]] as Lucifer/Satan * Reiko Katsura as Lilith (In some dubs, Lilith is renamed Layla) * [[wikipedia:Junpei Takiguchi|Junpei Takiguchi]] as Lupeski * [[wikipedia:Ryo Ishihara|Ryo Ishinara]] as the narrator * Kôji Totani as Wheeler * Masaharu Satô as the boyfriend * [[wikipedia:Seiko Nakano|Seiko Nakano]] as Mallisa * Satomi Majima as the girl * [[wikipedia:Yasuro Tanaka (voice actor)|Yasurô Tanaka]] as Torgo (In some dubs, Torgo is renamed Torgo Nia; in some places, his name was miswritten as Tomo) For the English language version written and directed by [[wikipedia:Robert V. Barron|Robert Barron]], and produced by Harmony Gold Ltd: * Ted Layman as Dracula * Stan Jones as the narrator Some sources have also added the following voice actors to the movie, based mostly on speculation:[http://www.crystalacids.com/database/title/1433/dracula/ Dracula: Sovereign of the Damned in Crystalacids] * Arlena Banas as Dolores and Billy * Robert V. Barron as the narrator (who was official credited to Stan Jones), Torgo, Al, and stud #1 * Richard Epcar as Satan and God * Rebecca Forstadt as female NYC victim, sister #1 and sister #2 * Robin Levenson as Mallisa and Harold's girl * Melanie MacQueen as Rachel Van Helsing * Edie Mirman as Layla * Simon Prescott as barfly #2, radio broadcast and Satanist * Barry Stigler as barfly #1, male NYC victim and stud #2 * Dan Woren as Frank Drake and the bum * Tom Wyner as Dracula (who was officially credited to Ted Layman) (All are voice actors) | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = * [[Marvel Films#Foreign Films|Marvel Films]] }} [[Category:Toei]] [[Category:Christmas]]
